name: Micha Kops / hasCode.com

### About me
I am a software engineer currently employed in Wiesbaden/Germany and I am sharing some of my more or less valuable insights on the internet e.g. in my blog by posting code/snippets, reviews and tutorials. If youâ€™re interested, please take a look at other resources of mine on the web:
